.. Homeostasis documentation master file

Welcome to Homeostasis's documentation!
========================================

Homeostasis is an advanced error self-healing and monitoring system that integrates with modern DevOps pipelines.

   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

   ansible_integration

   csharp_integration
   vscode_integration
